website_summaries.verdict: It's a tough-looking, easy to control RC car suited for indoor and outdoor use, but it doesn't have a lot of fancy features or long battery life.
pros: Kids can race this tough mid-level RC car over most surfaces thanks to its sturdy wheels, 10 mph speed, and 2.4GHz interference-free frequency
cons: Battery life is somewhat short, and some of the plastic components feel flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Good RC car
customer_reviews.text: I have couple of other RC cars which we bought for gifts, I wanted one for myself as a hobby. This one was within my budget and affordable. It has good speed and rides well indoors and outdoors. Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sud

customer_reviews.title: Good size radio controlled car
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13 year old grandson when I found out he was enjoying another radio controlled car I had given to his little brother. He was thrilled. This one is a good size, and very fun for a good price. There's a good reason it is a best seller. I got free shipping to top it off and it was delivered right away. Excellent product and service. I am very happy with the purchase and will buy more for other grand-kids.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Morris

customer_reviews.title: Wroom wroooom race car...
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it.. Adults too had fun, reminding their childhood.. Pros: * Light weight but sturdy. * Good design and quality for the price. * Yeyyy to RECHARGEABLE BATTERY, charges very quickly. * Comes with the screwdriver, doesn't have to search for one from the toolkit that may or may not fit. * Comes with an extra battery, each lasts around 15 to 20 mins. * The front wheel is independent, which offers the speed. Cons: - The back wheel isn't independent, if it was it would have been much faster. - The instructions could be better, but that's not a turnoff. Overall a very good startup race car for the price (below $50 when I bought it).
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car!
customer_reviews.text: My son is going to love this for Christmas!!! We pulled it out early to make sure it worked well and now my husband wants one for himself. We drove it for a good 20 minutes. It is fast and drives well. It handles bumps and turns with no issue. The steering is very sensitive, so it does take a little practice, but so much fun when you have that down. The only minor complaint we have is the clearance underneath. It drove ok on grass, but did slow down quite a bit because of the clearance. It was easy to get going and even comes with its own screwdriver for the battery cover. Overall great car!!
customer_reviews.author: CARMENDY11

customer_reviews.title: Two in a row didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my oldest. First one worked with the small charge that it came with. In the interim, we charged the other battery pack overnight. Just didn't work with charged packs. Sent back. Second one came next day (awesome!) but didn't work at all, even briefly and not with charged packs. I guess it's possible that it's user error, but I do feel like that is unlikely. Sadly will be returning and looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: lsanski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pick for a hobbyist or for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little RC car to express your inner racer. I got this as a simple toy to just zip around the house and watch my son chase it. He enjoys it and it’s been tons of laughs for him. It’s zips around very quick and can go on most terrain surfaces which is awesome. PROS + Included 2 rechargeable battery cells for the vehicle itself. + Lightweight, but also feels quality. + Has a good range from vehicle to receiver. + Responsive controller. + Include screwdriver. + Very awesome design + Multi-terrain compatible. + Speedy! + Inexpensive! CONS - The wheel turn radius is a bit tighter than I would’ve like making it difficult to do tight turns.
customer_reviews.author: senpai.

customer_reviews.title: Nice RC - easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old son and we both love it. It come nicely packaged and was very simple to unpack and get up and running. The spare battery that comes with the set is handy - when the one in there runs out you replace with the spare. The remote is durable and will stand up to the wear and tear of daily use. The details on the car all look great - from the detail on the exterior to the shocks, etc. It does not have crazy pickup - which is good for a younger driver - they can easily avoid smashing it into walls, etc. Overall a great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy awesome price
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fun great rc car. Not what I remember growing up with. Way more fun now if you only filial throttler it kind of hard to get it to turn like you want but if let off the gas it respond great even pinball the way it will turn just more then you may want and start doing donuts. But my son loves it as well it’s his second RC car the first one he barely played with this one he is always playing with it. He’s put it through hell and back and still going strong. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Inthe808

customer_reviews.title: For children of all ages :)
customer_reviews.text: We must always keep having fun and enjoying simple things in life, this is one of them for my husband and I, we keep plying games and getting new toys! This was super fun to use and play with, I was a better driver than my husband, it goes very fast so we used it outside only, I am sure that is you can drive it better you can play with it inside too! the gun style remote is very easy to use, the wheel is to turn left or right and the trigger is forward or backward, it comes with its charger ! we love it and recommend it for younger children too😁 Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: Yay beat my race car if you can
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my race car collections which i recently bought for my son and we both have fun using it together. We prefer running it on hardwood floor or outside as it runs fast. It runs great on carpet too but hard floor gives much better performance. However make a note to charge it before using so you get enough running time. Its a relief that it has rechargeable battery so no need to buy replacement batteries and fully charge battery lasts around 15-20 minutes. Overall its great race car for the price. No doubts there are so many good reviews for this seller. Free shipping and it was delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Harjeet Makkar

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 24 hours and the rear left tire broke off during use. Couldnt find the screw either. The plastic is very thin on the rim shaft. This reminds me of the RC cars you find at Target. Steering servo doesnt stop when turning so it makes a grinding noise. Rear suspension is more about looks than functional as the rear axle is restricted above so it cant utilize the shocks properly. Decent toy for indoor use but wont even travel through fresh cut grass. My daughter did love it for the hour she used it though so I can see why this item is popular.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Michalski

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun car, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Great rc car, my toddler loves it.. My husband and I enjoy using it too! Set up was a breeze. The remote is very responsive and easy to use, my 3 year old has no trouble using it at all. The rc car itself is powerful and the big tires will go over over rugs and little toys. It even works outside on the lawn perfectly. I love the fact that you can recharge the car batteries via USB. There is an extra battery pack so whilst you are using one the other one can be charging! This was my first rc car and I will be buying more for my nephews this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: veejay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: I changed my rating bc customer service went way beyond the norm to make this right. Offering a free replacement which I appreciate so much. I have really never had a company go beyond what they need to do to make something right like they have. Keep up the good work!!!! Rear axle was broken, ordered a replacement but had to keep turning it on and off for it to work, charged battery all night so don’t think that was it, so returning the 2nd one as well. Do not waste your time on this. Only giving it 1* bc I have to.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome car...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great remote controlled car and I'm glad I chose this one despite having many other choices on Amazon. I bought it for a pre Hanukkah present for my son and he was absolutely thrilled about it, he loved playing with it for hours on end. I tested as well and it is definitely one of the better ones I've tried before, it has phenomenal shocks the maneuvering and control is great and overall a fun kid friendly and adult friendly product.
customer_reviews.author: D E

customer_reviews.title: Nice RC Car
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little remote controlled car that checks out most of the features that I was interested in. I am happy to have 2 batteries which double the playing time with the car. But to keep a screw driver handy for switching or charging the batteries is a little weird. I would have liked for the battery cover on the car to be able to open without a screw driver but something which is still secure enough. The screw driver is included though, so that's a plus. Other than that, I like the car very much, especially the shock absorbers. Attached couple of pics. They look very realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Ankur

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 11 year old grandson. He loved it. It’s quite durable and battery last about 15 minutes but it comes with 2 batteries. One can be charging while the other one is being used. It doesn’t make sharp turns but it goes pretty fast and you just have to make wider turns. Sharp looking as well. It’s a lot of fun, yes, we had to try it out before giving as a gift and were quite pleased with how fast it went. Recharged both batteries before wrapping it and it was ready to go. Priced well.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Poor box quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the packaging box is very cheaply made. It makes me wonder if the product is made just as cheap. It is also much smaller, and it is not a MONSTER truck, it is a small car.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Norton

customer_reviews.title: Cool RC car - works really!
customer_reviews.text: My child picked this car himself. After searching the amazon website for quite a while, he settled on this one and was so excited to have us place the order (it was a gift). Said there was something "special" about this one. We received it promptly and tested it right away. It was a blast! It goes pretty fast and nicely over bumps and grass. My kid had a blast! It turned out to be a great choice and so far it's holding up well. We will definitely order from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Novemberpeanut

customer_reviews.title: No power!  Won’t even go across grass or carpet...
customer_reviews.text: Received today returned today! No power and I let the batteries charge fully. Wouldn’t even go across carpet or low grass when trying out. I do not recommend this at all. I packaged back up and am returning. Will be looking for another product that can a
customer_reviews.author: Jepstone

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids; outstanding price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an RC car that young children could watch without being scared, and eventually learn to operate. This car is peppy, but it is quieter than most and therefore less scary. The Pistol Grip controller is easiest for a child. The front suspension is quite bouncy, giving the front wheels a negative camber. It’s too early for me to tell if this is a weakness. At least there is a tracking adjustment on the underside to compensate for drift. And I love having two batteries. This is a great car for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Fun for All!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this RC car because of the other good reviews, but it was really a gamble. RC cars in an economic range are usually fun for a few days, but are junk before long. This buggy is holding up well for my 13 year old! It's larger than I expected, but it's a nice size. It's very fast, able to jump ramps, has excellent control, and the battery lasts a good amount of time. All of his friends want one too!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J Wygant

customer_reviews.title: Good Gift for Kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my nephew's 5 years birthday, so far he loves it. There are two alternative battery for the car, I told him to charge two hrs for each one, and need to carry both when go out for playing. I like the control panel designation, there is a wheel that you can use to control the direction of the car, you can do left/right turn, backup. It is fun and good gift for kid.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin James

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The car was pretty weak, struggled to climb my driveway with a full battery. It could barely move in the grass. Also, the "suspension" was messed up upon arrival, the car kept pulling to one side. It was very difficult to drive because of the pull.
customer_reviews.author: spoon059

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality RC Car for the Price
customer_reviews.text: We were delighted to be asked to review this RC car. My son is a big fan! It's hard to find a good quality RC car in this price range. We've had too many stinky experiences. Imagine our surprise when we tried this car. It's well built, comes with two batteries and extra parts. It doesn't have a ton of power to get up hills quickly, but it's a boat load of fun around the house and yard. It manages well and is easy to drive. We can recommend this car due to the quality and customer service. This is the car to get if you're looking for one in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Just Us Almquists

customer_reviews.title: extra battery is a bonus
customer_reviews.text: My little man keep playing until battery run out, great way to keep my little booger away from the ipads and the tech. Great little device to kill time with my son, great purchase and price. Bonding with my little man is priceless and the price is great for
customer_reviews.author: TW270

customer_reviews.title: Nice slow car for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Overall if your looking for something thats slow, has a good controller, and has good battery life; this is for you. The car says it can go 20mph but that is simply not true(more like 2mph). this car does not like offroading but works decently on the pavement.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonTitans

customer_reviews.title: Ok, Pretty Fast, Ho-Hum
customer_reviews.text: It goes pretty fast, very responsive to steering, etc. However I wanted it for the grandkids to play out in the yard, It goes fine on pavement, very fast, but bogs down to nothing in the grass. Returning it. If you only want to drive on flat surface, I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Papa

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy Truck!
customer_reviews.text: My son, an RC car enthusiast, likes this car. It is a fast little truck that is fun to drive around the house and outside. He took it off some sweet jumps. He really likes the remote because it is the same kind as the expensive RC cars so it is good for learning on. The price is great for this fun little truck. It is not one that you can upgrade or accessorize like the higher-end trucks, but it is perfect for ages 7-11.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P.

customer_reviews.title: Works great - my 3yo loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our 3yo son for his birthday, and he loves it! I wish the battery life would last longer, but it's not any shorter than any other RC car. It's just wishful thinking. Definitely would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Family

customer_reviews.title: Tough Cool car
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson. He loves it and that's what is important. Seems built tough, he hasn't broken it, and that includes all the walls and table legs its been bounced off of so far. Many of both! I've already bought two more for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Not so Sweet Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner car!
customer_reviews.text: My son really loved this car. It was his second rc car. This was way better than the Walmart special. He was happy that he could keep up with his older brother's car. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Price

customer_reviews.title: Remote control cars
customer_reviews.text: The cars worked very well. If you buy more than one you could have issues. The frequency on the cars are all the same and you can’t change it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Great lil RC car
customer_reviews.text: The kids Love this lil RC car, I even take the remote sometimes. Great lil car, and it’s pretty fast. And my 5 year old nephew hits every wall and curb with it and it’s still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: MWDSoCal

customer_reviews.title: Stopped turning after a soft bump against a memory foam pillow.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well initially. On the first day it very lightly bumped a memory foam pillow and stopped turning in one direction (the other direction still worked). On the next day, another soft tire bump against a table and the it stopped turning in the other direction too. Now it just goes forwards and backwards... Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Hussain Ali

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Remote Car
customer_reviews.text: This car is great! My son is only 4 yrs old and has no problem using the remote control. It seems to be very durable. I would recommend this for any child who loves remote control cars! 😊
customer_reviews.author: raswas

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great r c car for young beginners. It is pretty tough as well as we run it into things and off jumps and no damage at all after a month of daily use. It goes much faster than i expected! It does sit low to the ground so best used on concrete or in the house won’t clear grass.
customer_reviews.author: Stu S.

customer_reviews.title: Battery sucks
customer_reviews.text: Battery dies after five minutes of use. It’s fun for those five minutes though. Hasn’t broken yet but seems like it‘s cheap/not durable.
customer_reviews.author: HD4386

customer_reviews.title: Meets my expectations
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The car has good speed and good control. The battery lasts about 15 minutes, but is runs fast the entire time. The kids really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Nghia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fast and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great RC car, coming with two batteries makes it great for longer play time, sturdy and durable for bouncing into all kinda stuff, car bowling is fun with the amount of speed it gives it off.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Edwards

customer_reviews.title: A pretty car with nothing under the hood
customer_reviews.text: We wanted so badly to love or even like this RC. Sad truth was you could buy one at your local discount store for half the cost. Poor workmanship and very slow. I definitely recommend passing on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rusk

customer_reviews.title: Not Hobby grade
customer_reviews.text: Overall an average rc car. Only 2wd with all or nothing steering. Not as fast and steering does get stuck easily. It was fun but didn't satisfy my adult self. Great for my girlfriend's little bro
customer_reviews.author: coolbean

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I bought this for my friend’s son and the whole family (hopefully her son gets to play with it the most lol) enjoys playing with it. Pleasantly surprised and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: book lover mom

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly except the extra battery is not charging well
customer_reviews.text: I received the product and I tried it right away. It works perfectly. Used up all two batteries but when it was time to charge them the LED light in the USB charger keeps blinking and not charging well. It's been a week that I've been trying to play but the battery drains so fast. I charge both batteries for 2 and a half hours but still doesn't work. I tried to charge it longer but still didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Cromwell Ongsingco Barredo

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Decent R/C car, has two batteries so that you can run the car and charge the other, takes a long long time to charge
customer_reviews.author: Meekrol

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fast and easy to drive
customer_reviews.text: Car drives really fast. Simple and easy to drive. Although reversing and then going forward again results in a complete loss of speed. Car comes with 2 batteries which is really cool as you can charge them while you drive.
customer_reviews.author: Shmuel

customer_reviews.title: This is a real review
customer_reviews.text: It's a terrible RC car. If you're looking for something that goes 1 mile an hour this is it and I'm not playing
customer_reviews.author: Love Leaf Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great First RC Car
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son's 10th Birthday. It is a great 1st RC car for him! He was able to easily control it and he had lots of fun driving it. Batteries don't take long to charge either. This car is mostly for flat surfaces of pavement/concrete, as it doesn't run great on gravel or in grass. Overall, we are quite pleased!
customer_reviews.author: hippychris

customer_reviews.title: powerful rugged car
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this car to have some outdoor fun with my kid. This is a beast, amazing power and the body is very sturdy. Loved the controls on the car to navigate - really impressed! Battery life is great, overall i think this is a good buy and i am happy with my experience.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Fun little RC car
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, all you have to do is pop in three AA batteries into the remote control and wear down the battery that's currently in the car by playing with it. You'll get about 5-10 minutes of play time before it requires a recharge. Pretty fun toy that you can play out of the box. After a full charge you can expect about 15-20 minutes of play time with the battery. Just a reminder, these batteries require you to first discharge them (via playing) before recharging them to maximize battery life. It also comes with a 2nd battery so you can double the fun.
customer_reviews.author: "savoyb"

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great little rc car. Bought for a 5 year old and is perfect for him. Good battery life and feels pretty solid
customer_reviews.author: Ronaldo

customer_reviews.title: Fun little car!
customer_reviews.text: This car is amusing. Drives great on cement and okay on mulch. The controls allow for going forward and backwards. My dog got her exercise chasing this car.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Most remote control cars my kids have gotten over the year break within the first couple days. This one has taken a nice amount of abuse and is still going. It works great, it is built well and great thing is it still keep my kids entertained!
customer_reviews.author: Avrohom Y Perlstein

customer_reviews.title: Defective upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. Front wheels were loose and faced inwards which made it difficult to turn or go straight. 1 star for poor quality control
customer_reviews.author: Mnl4jc

customer_reviews.title: Dud
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars. The remote car did not work at all!! This was a Christmas gift for my grandson who is only here for a few days from out-of-state. Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner RC for Child
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Distianert RC Monster Truck for our son's 6th birthday. He absolutely loves it! It's a great beginner rc for him. It's durable and the power and speed are great for everything that he has done with it (outdoor play; indoor box tracks/jumps; etc.). Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: kores1452

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I gift this item to my nephew and he love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Komal B

customer_reviews.title: Happy costumer
customer_reviews.text: Very fun toy! Works good and the service they gave me is the best! Bought one earlier but didnt worked well and suddenly it stopped working. Contacted the seller and responded very quickly and sent me a new one immidiately. Very happy costumer! Really recommendation
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great rc car for kids or adults!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a 7 year old! He loved it and I was happy that the battery lasted much longer than other rc cars. Would definitely recommend! I like playing with it too!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Burke

customer_reviews.title: works for 5 min
customer_reviews.text: my son got this as a holiday gift and it was a disaster it dies every 5 min with full battery life
customer_reviews.author: sruly

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t come with 2 batteries
customer_reviews.text: This item says it comes with 2 batteries which is why I purchased and I only received one! Not happy as it was claimed to have 2!!!
customer_reviews.author: SurfEr

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck!!!
customer_reviews.text: So, I wasn't expecting very much when I purchased this because of the price. but when I got it I was very pleasantly surprised. It's super fast very snappy and the battery life is decent. I only have one complaints and it is that the battery connector is kind of small and hard to fasten other than that great product highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Adamitis

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Kids and adults too
customer_reviews.text: This RC Desert Buggy is a great gift to buy for anyone, adults and kids. I got this as a gift, and absolutely loved it. This RC car was well within my budget and is affordable. It can travel at high speeds and rides well outdoors and indoors. This RC car was great, and I would recommend buying this RC car
customer_reviews.author: SURA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to drive for younger kids!!
customer_reviews.text: My eight year old loves this car!! He drove it all over with no problems!! Great product. It went much faster than expected. He was very happy. We had the amphibious one but he lost it in a garage fire so this was the next comparable one because they no longer make an amphibious one but that thing was awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lea Derner

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This car is SUPER fast and so much fun to play with! Once you get the hang of the remote, it’s even better! Also love that there are 2 car batteries included that are rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year and I to play with, we play with it a couple times a week. He loves it and it seems to be very durable. The battery life is sufficient and it is simple to switch out when the batteries run low.
customer_reviews.author: Burt Macklin

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: The car is lacking in power can't go up the hills where we live or in our yard due to grass. I really thought for the money it would be better. I would not recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: kevin d.

customer_reviews.title: Fun rc car while battery lasts
customer_reviews.text: Overall for the price it is a great RC car. Fun fast and affordable. Only negative is battery life. Realistically lasts 5-7 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good race car
customer_reviews.text: My 6 years old was so happy with this toy. It is very suitable for kids from 4 to 8. It comes with two batteries so you can have a spare. The only thing that I did not like that it’s not fast as I thought it will be.
customer_reviews.author: Sh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great for  GrandKids
customer_reviews.text: Is this a good starter RC car !! It's easy for the GrandKids to control and I'm sure it will provide many hours of Fun. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it! Well made RC car!
customer_reviews.text: I got this RC car for my almost 12 year old son and he loves it! He said it’s very good for beginners, almost meeting hobby grade and the steering is as good as hobby grade! I am very impressed with how well it was made! Solid car and super fun! Thank you for making such a great car!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great car
customer_reviews.text: Really fabulous car! Good speed and handles nicely. My 5 year old loves it. Great quality for the money. Customers have complained about the battery life, but it comes with 2 batteries that each last about 15 minutes. I feel that is adequate. Time just flies when you're having fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra & Sundance

customer_reviews.title: Great RC car
customer_reviews.text: One of the best RC car i have seen. Runs great, battery holds charge longer. Quality of product is good with sleek looks . My kid likes to play with it all the time, which makes me feel extremely satisfied buying it. Great product, worth buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Harish Narang

customer_reviews.title: Fun lil car
customer_reviews.text: Fun. Steering isn’t too straight even with adjustments but what can you expect for a good price
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: Only a few days in and it broke. Cheap plastics. Not all that impressive. Spend the extra $$ for something else.
customer_reviews.author: UT Skier

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Fun to play with for all ages. I think grandpa had as much fun as the grandson. Easy to control and moves well Inside and outside
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We've had many remote control cars and this one was not worth the $50.00 The battery life is poor and it had trouble going in reverse from day one depending on which battery we used. Now it doesn't work at all, just makes noise. We shop Amazon on a regular basis and will think twice when it comes to electronics in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Super fun - great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little car! Better than any that I’ve gotten from Walmart or Target for the price! The remote takes a little bit to get used to but not tough at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: Battery ends very fast, does not walk on grass and sand, the car is very slow. not worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Leoncio Junior

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We took this out of the box brand new, put good new batteries in it and charged the batteries before use just like it said and it still does not work. It'll run for maybe a minute or two before it dies and then that's it. Very disgusted with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really fun car!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this car for my 5 year old and he is having so much fun with it! The instructions are clear, battery life is great and seems to be pretty durable...can’t say how it will hold up over time since we just got it but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E. Greer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson. He loves it and my son, his Dad does too!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great car for kids to play with, super fast and battery lasts long
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: For hard level surfaces only..
customer_reviews.text: Does not travel on grass or rocky areas very well at all. Would not move an inch on the grass. Does fine on concrete or asphalt. If you live in the city it would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great car
customer_reviews.text: Great working car. Runs fast! But be careful being around other remote controls as it sometimes gets interference with the remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very unimpressed with this truck. Steering loose and flopping. Wheels camber real bad. Put a little extra money in and get something better than this truck
customer_reviews.author: Js

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The only way this car would go 20mph is if it fell off a cliff. It stopped working after 3 days of very little use.
customer_reviews.author: Celine S

customer_reviews.title: Nice little car
customer_reviews.text: Great starter RC car. I bought it for my 9 year old boy who gives it a beating and it holds up excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Kshan1119

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: It’s really good quality and how the the remote it so easy to learn how to use the second it’s on your hand also the speed it has From Mohamedfazaa59@gmail.com
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed fazaa

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. Anyone who gave this 5stars was following the instructions to get a little me year replacement plan. Ours didn’t last one drive. Gears immediately grind the first time we tried reverse. Very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine indoors not for outdoor use except on flat asphalt
customer_reviews.text: This product I fine for indoors but took it in the yard with low cut grass and it bogs down and stops. Was expecting something that would run outdoors based on reviews. I will be getting something different.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin B. Sipes

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Won’t even drive in the grass. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Kaytie Zinser

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but drives poorly
customer_reviews.text: This car lacks overall quality. My first order, the wheel broke before I could try it out. The replacement car shipped quickly but had issues connecting to the remote. The car would stall or be non-responsive to remote commands. I decided to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ant87

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. It works great on our diet drive way.
customer_reviews.author: Deonna B.

customer_reviews.title: Eh, it’s just ok.
customer_reviews.text: Pro: cost Cons: does not work well in yard or gravel driveway, kids got Frustrated when it gets stuck and won’t play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my grandson early. It stopped working right in 2 days. I couldn’t send it back because it was after the time allowed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My friends son loved the car. He thought it was really fun. The battery ran out really fast though. Other than that I thought it was great for kids. He seemed to really enjoy playing with it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Wheel Broke the First Week
customer_reviews.text: Broke the first week we’ve had it. The wheel came off from crashing into our wall. The car wasn’t even going that fast. Disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: waheed

customer_reviews.title: Good little rc
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is not that great. It only give you like 15 min per full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this car! Its incredibly fast and very easy to drive with good stability and control! The battery drains quite fast but it's not a problem since you can recharge it!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna K.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It’s fast! Great colors! My son loves it! Received this product for a review!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer siery

product_meta.title: distianert 1: 16 Scale Electric RC Car on & Off Road RTR Vehicle 2.4Ghz Radio Remote Control Car 15km/H High Speed Racing Monster Truck + Battery & Charger
feature_bullets: ★Realistic Desert Buggy looks: It like a real Desert Buggy and even looks The part thanks to 1/16 scale detailed design, Desert Buggy style body, roll cage and driver cockpit.
★2.4 GHz control system: with 2.4GHz transmitter; you'll never get any radio interference with this electric car. It is ready to race.
★Ready to run: all you need to get started are 3 AA batteries for the transmitter! Powerful motor for speeds of 8-10 mph on the street, in your backyard and everywhere in between.
★Easy to use: pistol grip style transmitter. Full function of forward/reverse/left/right and stop. Pistol grip style transmitter make it easy to control even a 5 years kid.

★15mins battery life: included USB Charger gives you the convenience of charging. A bottom loading battery compartment provides you with easy access to the battery without removing the Body and spoiler. › see more product details
